node.statement: Path-Integral Hockey-Stick Representation: Under full-rank assumption (rho_AB, sigma_AB > 0), H(A|B)_sigma - H(A|B)_rho = -∫₀¹∫₀^{M(t)} Tr[P_gamma(t) delta_AB^{(gamma)}] / [gamma(1 + d_A gamma)] d gamma dt, where rho(t) = (1-t)rho_AB + t sigma_AB, tau(t) = 1_A ⊗ rho(t)_B, P_gamma(t) = 1{rho(t) - gamma tau(t) > 0}, delta_AB^{(gamma)} = delta_AB - gamma 1_A ⊗ delta_B, M(t) = M(rho(t), tau(t)) ≤ d_A.
